About


Smart Parking Platform provides a world-class unique set of technology and data capabilities to solve for parking management and congestion in our cities for better urban mobility by planning, designing, integrating, executing, and maintaining smart parking ecosystem suitable to that city.



  • platform designed to solve parking problems for Smart cities
  • Disruptive parking management

  • 20+ features included
  • Helping over 30 cities to improve their urban mobility
  • Help center access
  • discovery for urban commuters, parking lot operators & owners, city planners & administrators
